featured.text: Without it you would not now be reading this passage.

The King agreed and gave Nehemiah a letter “to the governors of the province beyond the river,” requesting safe passage for him as he travelled through their lands.

definition.zh_def: 通道；段落，特別是指書籍或文章中的一段文字。
definition.en_def: A section of text, especially a portion of a written work.
definition.example: She read a passage from her favorite book.
